assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: FM has served on scientific advisory boards for, Prosensa, Servier, Roche, PTC Therapeutics and Pfizer. FM receives research support from PTC Therapeutics, Prosensa, Sarepta Therapeutics, Roche, ISIS and Summit plc. VR, HJ, MT, ATM and DT report no disclosures.
